name: Using Your Head
description:
A run-based platformer game where you chuck your head around to generate enough terrain to progress to the next level. Created in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Gameplay, "Art" by Trevor Swope

Music, FX by Madison Butler. Check out some of his tunes here!

Controls: 

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Roll/Retrieve Head: R
  • Pause: P
  • See Die Faces: I
  • Interact: E
